name: Vicodin (hydrocodone/acetaminophen)
description: Vicodin is a popular drug for treating acute or chronic moderate to moderately severe pain
use: Its most common side effects are lightheadedness, dizziness, sedation.

name: Albuterol (Accuneb, Ventolin, Proair)
description: Albuterol sulphate dilates the airways of the lung and is used for treating asthma and other conditions of the lung.

name: Lisinopril (Generic for Prinivil or Zestril)
description: Lisinopril is an angiotensin-converting enzyme (ACE) inhibitor used for treating high blood pressure
use: Lisinopril side effects include dizziness, nausea, headaches, drowsiness, and sexual dysfunction.
